description: Create a raw transport driver record.
permissions: User must be an admin or have admin membership in the broker specified by --broker.
side_effects: Creates a raw transport driver and schedules an asynchronous import job after creation when an importer is configured.
validation_notes: --broker, --external-driver-id, and --tables are required. --tables must be a JSON array. Each table entry must include table_name, query, and primary_key_column. If a table has rows, at least one row must include a column whose key matches primary_key_column. Column entries require key. external_driver_id is required on the model. importer, when provided, must be quantix_tmw. If the only validation error is a duplicate import checksum for the broker, the API returns the existing record instead of failing.
